comment: PHENOMENAL PROF! I had her when it was at her last semester teaching at KSU. She is kind, caring and is passionate about her students, and encourages you to write. If u have the opportunity to take her classes anywhere else, pls pick her! It's been 2 years since I took her class but I will always remember how great of an educator she's been to me.

She is by far the best professor I've met over the past 2 years at KSU!! TAKE HER CLASS! Easy weekly assignments and 3 papers. Technically, you don't need to show up to class, but the majority of people do since the class conversations are so interesting and thought-provoking. She really helps open up your eyes to the world. Highly recommend!
One of my favorite Professors from KSU. Absolute gem.

3-4 papers w/ longest paper being 3 pages. final: diary document which basically is after each class you have to write down what happened(you can always get from fellow classmates).big part of grade:you have to take attendance at least once which isn't bad. Had class outside sometimes, & stretched almost everymorning. hw: meditate&change routine

Amy Belk is the best Professor Ive had at KSU thus far. If you have the opportunity to take one of her classes, take it. Even though attendance was optional, people still went to class every week because of how fun and stress free the environment was. She focused more on teaching us and getting to know us over worrying about grades. Take Amy Belk!

Amy Belk is an incredible teacher and person alike. She is a wonderful person to be around and is great at teaching. She has taught me a lot about caring, perspectives, and being the best version of myself. 3rd semester with her and they have been the best classes I've ever taken.

I had her for English 1102 and is one of my favorite professors. Her assignments are easy to complete and are actually fun because she is really into you writing what you want to write about. She had helped me open myself up in writing and learn how to enjoy writing. Very interactive class, so be ready to read your work and share your thoughts.
Amazing teacher

Mrs. Belk is a very genuine person, and you don't get bored in her class. She gets very thoughtful and you have to participate but it can be a really fun class. As long as you show signs of caring about literature she'll love you

Professor Amy was one of my favorite professors ever! She is so sweet and cares a lot about you. She will learn your name and make you feel at home while in her class. It's very clear what assignments you have for the semester and all are very easy. She is changing up what we did every class. Not your normal writing and essay heavy class. TAKE HER!
amazing teacher. This is my second time taking her class and I dont regret it at all. Shes inspirational and cares about every student individually. You wont regret taking her class

This was my second time taking her, I absolutely adore this woman. She is so inspiring and caring. She has opened my eyes to the world around me. She makes class truly enjoyable and she is hilarious and so raw. You would be doing yourself a disservice by taking anyone else for literature.

Every 2 weeks or so is dedicated to a region of the world. You read 2 books per region (or just sparknote them) & take a map quiz over the countries. She's super lenient & works with you if work is late. I got a 100% on every assignment so an A is deff doable. She's young & curses a lot too so it makes class relatable & funny. I loved Amy. TAKE HER

Amy changed my life. I can't because gin to explain how important of a professor she was to me this semester and the semester before. yeah, that's right I took her twice. SHES THAT GOOD. easy A. I highly recommend.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: Professor Belk is a great professor and an easy A. I highly recommend her. She is an amazing person and her class is super chill and relax. It is mandatory but it definitely was worth going to class.
My favorite professor in college so far, show up and keep an open mind and don't use your phones. Definitely an experience worth having

My fave professor yet. We traveled the world by reading books and researching authentic voices from that region. Weekly "Friday Adventures" where you write about what you researched, 4 map quizzes, 8 books (but only 4 if you do 4 volunteer shifts). Believes in re-dos. Please participate. You will come out with a new perspective on the world.

I can not even begin to express how amazing she is. Its definitely not a traditional English class, however; she is so well respected and influential and hands down the best professor Ive had at Kennesaw. She focuses more on real world issues and increasing awareness rather than traditional English lectures. If you have the chance, take her 100%.
Best english teacher i have had. only 3 papers the whole semester and the longest one has to be 3 pages. super fun classes

Really great teacher that truly cares about the development of her students. She gave some of the most interesting english assignments I think I'll ever recieve. If you're looking for a more traditional and non-participatory class do not take her. You may even get to do some yoga

Professor Belk is one of my favorite teachers of my entire school career. She is the sweetest woman. She is quirky in a good way. She made my 6:30-7:45pm class actually bearable and even fun. She likes the class to get involved and doesn't want to be lecturing for the whole class. I LOVE her!

She really cares about her students. She is super funny and wants everyone to have fun. As long as you put in effort, she will help you. She is the best professor I have ever had. I recommend her 100%!

Ms. Belk is an outstanding professor. 4 essays, probably 1 homework assignment a week (super easy), and lots of participation grades. If you don't like speaking in front of a class of around 25 people, I would not recommend her class. Otherwise, she was amazing! I was dying to take her again for 1102 but apparently so was everybody else.
By far my favorite teacher Ive ever had. She teaches you life-applicable tools instead of just pointless information. I have so so enjoyed being in her class!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!:)

Dr. Amy Belk was one of the sweetest people I have had the pleasure of knowing. Not only does she teach the material well, but she inspires her students to be awesome individuals outside of the classroom. Please take her class. You will not regret it.

even though I usually don't like lit/english classes, she honestly made this my favorite class this semester! She only assigns 3 essays and gives clear directions on how to write them. Most of your grade is based on showing up to class, and speaking up at least once per class (and she makes it easy to do even if your anti-social).
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: The best professor I have ever taken at KSU. I went in thinking it would be an ordinary English class, but I left with a better understanding of myself and the world around me. Lectures were meaningful and personal. By the end of the first class she knew everyone's name. 3 essays and writing journals in class. TAKE HER!!! YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT.
WONDERFUL! You can ask anyone who attended this class and they will all agree it was truly a joy and fun time anytime we had class. She made class so easy while also learning so much! Loved HER!!
Participation is majority of your grade, so if you dont like to talk in front of others and be extremely open, this class is not for you.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Amy isn't hard she wants you to try. She trusts that you're doing what you claim is your best. She will let you write on paper and on a computer and she truly cares about students learning than their actual grade. Again even though it's easy work, if she knows you're trying and you participate you have an A.

By far the most amazing professor Ive ever had. She cares so deeply for her students and goes above and beyond to be there for her students. She is so understanding and positive. I genuinely wish I could take her every semester.

Professor Belk has by far been my favorite english teacher throughout highschool to now. She really cares about her students and is willing to work with you if you miss days to get you caught up. Not much from the textbook. Her lectures are interesting and she's incredibly personable and funny. I would totally recommend her for english!
